warning.title: Staking will lock your funds for 21+ days
warning.subtitle:
You will need to undelegate in order for your staked assets to be liquid again.
This process will take 21 days to complete.

hint.title: Trying to switch validators?
hint.subtitle: Use the ‘Redelegate’ feature to instantly stake your assets to another validator.

warning.title: Once the unbonding period begins you will:
warning.subtitle:
- not receive staking rewards
- not be able to cancel the unbonding
- need to wait 21 days for the amount to be liquid
